html:
ProvidersMoreHTML to text
HTML to text

html2text is a Python package that converts a page of HTML into clean, easy-to-read plain ASCII text.

The ASCII also happens to be a valid Markdown (a text-to-HTML format).

Installation and Setup‚Äã
pip install html2text

Document Transformer‚Äã

See a usage example.

from langchain.document_loaders import Html2TextTransformer
